main event: On 12 May 1952, T/Sgt Richard Bare observed a bright glowing object in the sky, described as disc-shaped, over Roswell, New Mexico.
interesting points: The object appeared to be a star initially but began to move,The sighting lasted approximately 25 minutes with the object changing altitude between 20,000 and 50,000 feet,The object exhibited zig-zagging movements and repeated its course three times,While climbing, the object shifted in color from dim blue-green to very bright blue-green,The weather conditions did not account for the sighting and no photographs were taken.
sighted object: a very bright glowing disc-shaped object
witness description: T/Sgt Richard Bare, a Maintenance Specialist with eight years of service in the USAAF
